attributes.additional_details: A total ban on automated telephone calls trying to sell us meaningless services. I am fed up with being disturbed by a phone call that, when you pick up the receiver, is silent for a short period before some automated voice irritates the heck out of you with drivel.

rejection.details:
There is one entitled "To prohibit unsolicited or random telemarketing calls" - suggesting one would need to opt-in to receive automated calls.

Hopefully that covers your description.  If not, please re-submit.
